title: Unreasonably perma banned. I think I need a hug..
body:
I know I did wrong and got carried away after stressfully reaching level 30 and my mastery 7 Nami in less than 1 month. Me and the staff member mama meep talked it over and had a long discussion about my words and actions in the game. I fixed these problems and haven't shown any thing of the sort on my account yet. I played a game. We lost. It was a fun and close game. I was getting my jungler kill after kill with my support. I socialized with the enemy in a friendly way and did not harass them or verbally assault them. If any thing my top laner was being a social pain for telling me I was being a bad support to my ADC who wasn't doing so great since it was his first time. But I didn't bother him about it. I just laughed it off and enjoyed the game with my frienemies.

After the game ended I didn't even get to see the lobby with the score board and such. I literally logged in today and was perma banned. I have no reason to make any outbursts since I've been on break and I've gotten to do every thing I wanted with the account (other than get to play draft).
My mind was blown when the window appeared saying I was perm banned. No chat log. No email. No return.

I submitted a ticket to support in hopes that this may have been some sort of mistake and that they realize I had already served a 14 day ban.

Like, literally. Every one was chill. We all were having fun. I got to stretch my sea legs a bit and had a really good fight with some of the players who were pretty tough but that wasn't driving me to be toxic or any thing.

https://gyazo.com/93a771b65b80bd505a48928fbd6cf465

After finally calming down pondering over what it was I had done so wrong to be perma banned after being a good person. I re logged into my league account and low and behold. A chat log that was reported but not gone through that was made before my 14 day suspension. This confirms it. They're not doing their job or the computer/system thingy they have for it is flunked. When you get perma banned for something that you were already 14 day suspended for... Wtf.. I actually don't know if I wanna play any more. I'm kind of scared. 

Mama Meep made me feel better. She even taught me that I can slide the chat off the screen if things got to hectic. I was ready to just be social with people and not trash talk. Just be combat friendly with them and not pick fights with them. Have a good time instead of going around calling yi every thing possible.

But now... Well I just feel really sad about being perma banned for something over 2 weeks ago when I was just now being a good person and finally relaxed after reaching my in game goals.

An update on the situation. Please Riot. You are not being comprehensive with this.

If you'd like, I can post your chat logs from your very first game after being back from a 14-day ban, and see if you don't think you deserve the ban.

You can also re-log into the client to view them yourself if you don't want me to post them here.
So why haven't you posted it yet? We're you not able to find it? Pretty sure its there. You can probably have someone fetch it for you if you suck at your job, too.
